title: Day 1008
content:
# Day 1008

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1871748341366956131](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1871748341366956131)](https://miro.medium.com/0*pQe9HQWnd24bldSf)

Tomorrow is Christmas. Another year down man how fast time flies. It was around this time last year I had started at Fidelity only to find out I landed the Swan job. So glad I ended up working in Bitcoin instead of traditional finance.

Feels good to be employed. I don't want to be a wage slave for the rest of my life, but I'm so grateful to have a job I actually enjoy.

Before I know it I'm going to wake up and find that it's about to be 2035. Time flies as an adult when you have lived more years. Here are some things I want do accomplish in 2025.

Be a good flag football coach. I am excited for the opportunity to teach young men about football. Continue learning about Bitcoin. Have another child God willing. Keep improving binmucker.com and be a force for good in the world. Write a book filled with memes. Also commit to getting in shape by forcing the peer pressure of X to make me healthier. Yea I think I'm going to do the shirtless posting thing even though it is a bit gay.

Not a bad list. I believe I can do this. No better yet I know I can do this. I'm a stud. God gifted me with the ability to write and a good sense of humor. He also gave me one kid so I'll keep praying he gives me another.

Merry Christmas anon. So much to be grateful for this time of year. I hope you have an excellent holiday and if you are not reading this during the Christmas season I hope you are having an excellent day. It's always a great day to go and get what you want out of life. BANG BANG!!!!

![Also friendly reminder the IRS is unamerican and ridiculous. We need a flat tax in this country [https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1871742729535041951](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1871742729535041951)](https://miro.medium.com/1*Fw3COwYG0nOvYpTG5CLXpw.png)

12/24/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
